title: It's time to admit it, Microsoft really is a sexy company
text:
Poor old Microsoft. Not even being the world’s most valuable company can entirely shake the perception that the US giant is the fuddy-duddy uncle of the tech bros.

As it revealed its new lineup of Surface laptops – including the snazzy dual-screen Surface Neo and pocket-sized Surface Duo – Microsoft’s event did not have the same Hollywood pizzazz and widespread mania of a few short weeks ago when Apple showed off a new iPhone.

I’m sure the trillion dollar market cap is consolation enough, with Microsoft more focused on practical matters such as business software and cloud services than spiffy gadgets, but the new Surface reveals show there is flair in the old dog yet.

Sexy in its own way, like...
